body_html:
just add

cc_binary(
name = "libtensorflowLite.so",

linkopts=["-shared", "-Wl"],
linkshared=1,

copts = tflite_copts(),
deps = [
":framework",
"//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops",
],

to any positon of tensorflow's BUILD file. the BUILD file is in tensorflow's root folder

body:
just add

cc_binary(
name = "libtensorflowLite.so",

linkopts=["-shared", "-Wl"],
linkshared=1,

copts = tflite_copts(),
deps = [
    ":framework",
    "//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops",
],

to any positon of tensorflow's BUILD file. the BUILD file is in tensorflow's root folder
